//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "truck", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "explosion" );
	use ( "smoke" );
	remove ( "truck" );
	wait ( 500.000 );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/weapons/explosions/metal_scrape.wav" );
	wait ( 1000.000 );
	remove ( "smoke" );
	remove ( "explosion" );
}
